lst.name: sentence
lst.str: FMC had charged that Boesky received confidential information about FMC's planned recapitalization from Dennis Levine, a former merger specialist with Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Also, the suit said Boesky bought a further 1,922,000 FMC shares between March 12 and April four, acknowledging the purchase of a 7.5 pct stake in the company in a 13-D filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission on April seven.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Williams, in an oral ruling, said FMC had not been harmed by trading in FMC stock by Boesky and other traders prior to FMC's two-billion dlr recapitalization last year.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Williams, in an oral ruling, said FMC had not been harmed by trading in FMC stock by Boesky and other traders prior to FMC's two-billion dlr recapitalization last year.
